text: Last Dance is a 1996 American drama movie directed by Bruce Beresford and starring Sharon Stone, Rob Morrow, Randy Quaid, Peter Gallagher, Jack Thompson, Jayne Brook, Skeet Ulrich, Patricia French. It was distributed by Touchstone Pictures and was a box office disappointment. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1996 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Bruce Beresford Category:Movies set in South Carolina Category:Movies about capital punishment Category:Movies set in prison
title: Last Dance (movie)
